title: Why You Should Never Kiss a Grump
description: A gumpy-sunshine, age-gap rom comThere are so many reasons he’s going to regret that first kiss…The problem with wanting his friend’s much too sweet and innocent younger sister? His grumpy personality doesn’t work on her. She knows him too well. But when Sara Bradford decides she wants Jason “Mac” Gordon too? He’s screwed. In the bad way. But the good way, too. So, what if he can’t resist her. It’s only temporary. It has to be. He’s too old. And cynical. And he likes his bedroom games too dirty. And, oh yeah, her brother will never forgive him.  this book was previously published as Just My Type (Just Everyday Heroes: Day Shift/ the Bradfords)The Series:Why You Should Never Kiss Your Boss (Ben & Jessica)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Blind Date (Sam & Dani)Why You Should Never Kiss A Grump (Mac & Sara)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Fake Boyfriend (Dooley & Morgan)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Ex-Husband (Kevin & Eve)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Brother’s Best Friend (Ryan & Amanda)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Ex (Shane & Isabelle)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Enemy (Nate & Emma)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Best Friend (Cody & Olivia)Why You Should Never Kiss Your Roommate (Conner & Gabby)
author: Erin Nicholas
